ygData.subject: Re: remove me from the list please
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Look three lines up ;) Also, I m just bored enough that if you do send a Get me off this crazy thing! message, I ll do it manually.  Makes me feel like I
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:50 PM 10/14/99 +0930, you wrote:
>Mailing-List: list eqbards@onelist.com; contact eqbards-owner@onelist.com
>Delivered-To: mailing list eqbards@onelist.com
>Precedence: bulk
>List-Unsubscribe: <mailto:eqbards-unsubscribe@...>
>Reply-to: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] remove me from the list please
>
>From: "Dopester" <dopester@...>
>
>generally the people who type the "remove me now" or the "unsubscribe me"
>messages, are just too slack to look for themselves, sheesh, they where
>smart enough to subscribe themself, surely unscribing isnt too hard. So to
>expect these people to even know what a FAQ is or where to look for one is
>pushing it. Crickey I have been on lists where unscription info is on EVERY
>email, and fools still sent the unsubscribe me messages. Sad isnt.


Look three lines up ;)

Also, I'm just bored enough that if you do send a "Get me off this crazy
thing!" message, I'll do it manually. Makes me feel like I have power ;)

Talies
